response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering the extraordinary benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the limited availability and the opportunity for you to be among the first to experience its remarkable attributes. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss how this product can enhance your needs and expectations. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 15000}
